briefdescription.para: Name of Mutex controlling CDS Registry Access.
Initial Value of CDS Registry Access Mutex.

detaileddescription.para: Initializes the cFE core module API Library.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Locates and validates any pre-existing CDS memory or initializes the memory as a fresh CDS.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None
None

briefdescription.para: Copies the local version of the CDS Registry to the actual CDS.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Copies the local working copy of the CDS Registry to the CDS.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None
CFE_SUCCESS Operation was performed successfully
Any of the return values from CFE_PSP_WriteToCDS

briefdescription.para: Validates the Application ID associated with calling Application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Validates Application ID of calling App. Validation consists of ensuring the AppID is between zero and #CFE_ES_MAX_APPLICATIONS.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to value that will hold AppID on return.
The AppID as obtained from CFE_ES_GetAppID
The given application ID does not reflect a currently active application.

briefdescription.para: Creates a Full CDS name from application name and CDS name.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Takes a given CDS Name and combines it with the calling Application's name to make a processor specific name of the form: "AppName.CDSName"

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Note: AppName portion will be truncated to OS_MAX_API_NAME.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to character buffer of CFE_ES_CDS_MAX_FULL_NAME_LEN size that will be filled with the processor specific CDS Name.
pointer to character string containing the Application's local name for the CDS.
the Application ID of the Application making the call.
processor specific CDS Name of the form "AppName.CDSName".

briefdescription.para: Returns the Registry Index for the specified CDS Name.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Locates given CDS Name in the CDS Registry and returns the appropriate Registry Index.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to character string containing complete CDS Name (of the format "AppName.CDSName").
or the Index into Registry for Table with specified name

briefdescription.para: Locates a free slot in the CDS Registry.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Locates a free slot in the CDS Registry.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Note: This function assumes the registry has been locked.

parameterdescription.para: or Index into CDS Registry of unused entry

briefdescription.para: Locks access to the CDS Registry.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Locks the CDS Registry to prevent multiple tasks/threads from modifying it at once.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Unlocks access to the CDS Registry.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Unlocks CDS Registry to allow other tasks/threads to modify the CDS Registry contents.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Rebuilds memory pool for CDS and recovers existing registry.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Scans memory for existing CDS and initializes memory pool and registry settings accordingly

listitem.para: Assumes the validity of the CDS has already been determined

simplesect.para: CFE_SUCCESS Operation was performed successfully
Any of the return values from CFE_PSP_ReadFromCDS

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Initializes the data structure used to keep track of CDS blocks and who they belong to.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Determines whether a CDS currently exists.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Reads a set of bytes from the beginning and end of the CDS memory area and determines if a fixed pattern is present, thus determining whether the CDS still likely contains valid data or not.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None
CFE_SUCCESS Operation was performed successfully
CFE_ES_CDS_INVALID The CDS contents are invalid.
Any of the return values from CFE_PSP_ReadFromCDS

briefdescription.para: Initializes the contents of the CDS.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Stores a fixed pattern at the beginning and end of the CDS memory to tag it for future verification following a reset.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: Total size of CDS memory area (in bytes)

simplesect.para: Any of the return values from CFE_PSP_WriteToCDS
Any of the return values from CFE_ES_CreateCDSPool
